name: HtmlParser
description: Simple and fast crossplatform HTML/XML parser with a jQuery-like find() method. Also, contains a helper class to XML creating.
releasenote:
Add `addChildren()`.
Add nodejs support.
Avoid `stdlib` dependency.
Add boolean attributes support (thanks to @mrerikmedk (Michael Florentin)).
Avoid links to Serializer / Unserializer.
